Articles.Content:
Windows 64

Vanilla game

[Screenshots (similar to this OP](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/119648-BUG-1-0-Black-screen-on-launch-pad-and-celestial-view-after-back-on-spaceport))

[KSP log](https://www.dropbox.com/s/lk0t3l2oaim55w5/KSP.log?dl=0)

[output log](https://www.dropbox.com/s/mepx2g27l856h0y/output_log.txt?dl=0)

As soon as my Kerbal scientist softly landed head first on the flats from a landed craft on Minmus, this game-breaking glitch reared its head. Loading a quicksave from a couple minutes prior does nothing, neither does trying to switch camera back to the craft with the pilot. Game restart and resume lets me see the Kerbin base just fine, but if I try to take command of the minmus expedition, the glitch resumes. Both logs are copied from after I restarted the game and re-encountered the bug.

Any way to salvage?

Hi pgiustino, upload your save folder and it might be fixable.

If you are getting Windows blue screens (stop errors) you will need to disable the automatic restart and get the stop error message,[**\[Click here\]**](http://pcsupport.about.com/od/tipstricks/f/automatic-restart.htm)

Here are the saves. And it's an in-game Black-screen-of-death. Sorry for confusion.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/rrjtnw70fzpqkq4/quicksave.sfs?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/rrjtnw70fzpqkq4/quicksave.sfs?dl=0)

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/8ygts6od4sv0no8/persistent.sfs?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/8ygts6od4sv0no8/persistent.sfs?dl=0)
Luckily, busted Windows saves will often load on Linux, here's your saves back. [**\[Filedropper link\]**](http://www.filedropper.com/fixedsaves)

> 
> Luckily, busted Windows saves will often load on Linux, here's your saves back. [**\[Filedropper link\]**](http://www.filedropper.com/fixedsaves)

Thank you so much! Here's a pic as a token of gratitude.

![k58bxg0nT9gCgITkGBusXolxXtyV-J9seNWlfhjFbcI](https://photos-2.dropbox.com/t/2/AAA-89Wa1SBWJAO_49HrHFwA-LrrFbtJwVbu2ZnQz5RoCQ/12/47643126/png/1024x768/3/1431284400/0/2/savedTY.png/CPbz2xYgASACIAMgBCAFKAEoAigD/k58bxg0nT9gCgITkGBusXolxXtyV-J9seNWlfhjFbcI)
